thread.title: Good value, clean, 1 small block to Champs Elysees
thread.title_full: Good value, clean, 1 small block to Champs Elysees - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gabi K
title: Good value, clean, 1 small block to Champs Elysees
text: When we traveled, this hotel was just freshly renovated so everything was brand new. Staff was very helpful. My daughter flew in from USA with a fever and staff arranged for a Dr. to visit in room and prescribe medication. Very accommodating! WE had a great stay, rooms were clean and quiet. I was very pleased with the choice of hotel we were literally one minute from Champs Elysees, close to all transportation, walking distance to Arch de Triumph etc...
